name: Ninja Dash - Run and Jump game
name_original: Ninja Dash - Run and Jump game
description:
What kind of shoes do ninjas wear?
Sneakers! (Get it? sneak- ers...No? Ok..)

Run and jump through enemies and bombs while you show them your katana skills!

Prepare for some endless ninja fun! Unlock new powerful characters and win the battle for the ninja sushi.

Up for a real challenge? Play against epic bosses, set your ninja equipment and destroy anyone who dares to stand in your way.

FEATURES
8 different scenarios with epic levels
Choose between 7 ninjas
Easy to play with simple controls
Challenging but addictive

PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to play but certain in-game items can be purchased for real money.
